titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Correspondence and Subject files of the Virginia Office of the Secretary of Finance, 1986-1998
titlestmt.subtitle: Virginia Office of the Secretary of Finance 34593, 34974, 35256, 35871

titlepage.titleproper: A Guide to the Correspondence and Subject files of the Virginia Office of the Secretary of Finance, 1986-1998
titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
the Library of Virginia 34593, 34974, 35256, 35871

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Virginia Secretary of Finance Correspondence and Subject files, 1986-1998

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Virginia Secretary of Finance, Correspondence and subject files, [cite specific date and accession used], State government records collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Transferred from the Secretary of Finance, 16 March 1994 [Accession 34593]; Transferred from the Secretary of Finance, 16 October 1995 [Accession 34974]; Transferred from the Secretary of Finance, 1 October 1996 [Accession 35256]; and Transferred from the Secretary of Finance, 1998 [Accession 35871];

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection has been processed using minimal processing standards. The original arrangement has been maintained, the container list is brief and simple, and the records have not been refoldered and fasteners have not been removed.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Stuart W. Connock was appointed Secretary of Finance in 1984 by Governor Charles Robb and was reappointed in 1986 by Governor Gerald Baliles and served until his retirement in 1989. Paul W. Timmreck was appointed Secretary by Governor Douglas Wilder in January 1990 and was reappointed by Governor George Allen in 1994. Upon Timmreck's resignation in July 1996, Governor Allen appointed Ronald L. Tillett. Tillet was reappointed by Governor James Gilmore in 1998 and resigned in June 2001. Tillett's assistant, John W. Forbes, replaced him in July 2001 and served until the end of the Gilmore administration in January 2002.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This series contains correspondence and subject files relating to the fiscal management of the state government agencies. The majority of correspondence files are organized by Secretary and chronologically thereunder. Some correspondence is organized by subject or name of its recipient. The subject files are organized by headings. The files may include reports memoranda, budgetary bills presentations and speeches related to state financial activities, cost containment, state taxation, decentralization and other fiscal matters.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged into the following series:

list.item: Series I: Correspondence and subject files, 1986-1994 [Accession 34593];
Series II: Correspondence and subject files, 1986-1994 [Accession 34974];
Series III: Correspondence and subject files, 1988-1994 [Accession 35256];
Series IV: Correspondence and subject files, 1994-1998 [Accession 35871]
